entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
TEMPERATURE RISING INTO THE LOWER 60S AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 70
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
